about_the_game:
Buster Jam is a comedic, fast-paced minigame mania featuring an early 2000s art style and soundtrack. Its rich characters and story, paired with hilarious visuals and fluid animation truly immerse you into its world, as if you were playing a cartoon.

STORY

Robot businessman SYLUS is hosting the first ever SY-Corp Game Jam! Contestants create and compete with their very own video games; winner taking home a grand prize of $50,000. It's an opportunity Buster and friends can't turn down, but is there more to this Jam than meets the eye?

GAMEPLAY

Help Buster and friends create games through a fast-paced series of nonstop mini-game mayhem, and uncover the secrets that lie beneath SY-Corp. Characters have their own set of mini-games and aesthetic, bound to keep the experience fresh every level. Don't let their bossfights catch you off guard, as they're sure to keep you on toes right before the finish line.

WHAT NOW?

Buster Jam is still in development, and planned to release 2025. Wishlist the game to keep up to date with the project. (Wishlisting helps us, too!)
